content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the user, I received a response from my computer after using the "read_file" command to check the contents of the language_resources.txt file. The response contained a list of URLs related to language learning resources, travel destinations, and things to do in various cities.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "generate_image", "args": {"prompt": "The top language learning resources include:\\n- https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/\\n- https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language\\n- https://www.alllanguageresources.com/\\n- https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources\\n- https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/\\n- https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html\\n- https://www.mezzoguild.com/tools/\\n- https://www.fluentu.com/blog/online-language-learning-for-kids/"}}}'}]
"""
